function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global economic activities driving up CO2 emissions","Impact":"Increased risk of global CO2 emissions leading to environmental and public health issues","Mitigation":"Shift towards clean energy sources and sustainable economic practices","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, carbon capture and storage, sustainable development approaches","People":"Global population, vulnerable communities, environmental and public health","Owner":"Governments, environmental organizations, private sector"},{"Description":"Effects of economic recessions on emissions","Impact":"Surge in emissions after economic recessions, leading to environmental and public health issues","Mitigation":"Investment in clean energy and sustainable practices during economic recovery","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, sustainable infrastructure, green recovery initiatives","People":"Global population, vulnerable communities, environmental and public health","Owner":"Governments, environmental organizations, private sector"},{"Description":"Unpredictable changes in trajectory due to social trauma of lockdown and behavioral changes","Impact":"Unpredictable impact on emissions trajectory, leading to challenges in achieving low-carbon economy goals","Mitigation":"Education and awareness on sustainable practices, policy interventions to support low-carbon economy","Technologies":"Data analytics for monitoring emissions, social impact assessments, sustainable consumption technologies","People":"Policy makers, communities, environmental organizations","Owner":"Governments, environmental organizations, private sector"}]}
